timeline.bodyText: If you make this a checkbox (https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-your-work-on-github/about-task-lists), then it shows up nicely in the GitHub UI.
timeline.author: MikeDombo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6,6 +6,8 @@
 
 **How was this change tested:**
 
+**Is README updated for this change:**

replies.bodyText: Readme may not be applicable for a PR so in that case might be better as a text option where they can explain why it is NA?
replies.author: abanthiy

replies.bodyText: If it isn't applicable, then just checking the box is fine, they can add text too
replies.author: MikeDombo

replies.bodyText: Never realized the task list is actually displayed nicely in the open PR list... Yeah let's add it. We can just say "not needed for this PR" and check the box.
replies.author: leaf94

timeline.message: Updating the PR template with README checkbox
Updating the PR template with README checkbox
